title: 152: Episode #152: By The Way...
itunes:title: Episode #152: By The Way...
description:
• High Res Half-Blood Prince pics are FINALLY released. We discuss ’em.
  • Teaser Trailer rumors continue, and we wonder if it’ll every come.
  • Portus is next week!
  • We discuss details of our MuggleCast Meet Up.
  • Listener Rebuttals cover last week’s hot topics.
  • Chapter by Chapter goes over the final chapter in DH.
  • Was Voldemort in limbo with Harry?
  • A parallel between Hagrid carrying in DH and in SS.
  • What if we were in the perspective of someone other than Harry after he was in limbo?
  • Does the US cover really match what happens in the book?
  • High expectations, or naysayers?
  • We pick two songs to play in memory of Voldemort and Bellatrix.
  • Favorites: Chapter in Deathly Hallows.
  • Chicken Soup for the MuggleCast Soul.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
